Hotel: Md Valley Resort And Spa By Red Tullip Hotels
Contract Remarks:
Mandatory New year supplement of Rs 4500.
These rates are not valid during Diwali and New year peak dates.
Cancellation policy:-
FIT Business - All cancelation received less than 7 days prior to arrival will attract retention charges 
GIT/ series Business - all booking confirmation to be received 45 days prior to arrival. all cancellation received less than 14 days prior to arrival will attract retention charges of 1 night.
The New Year Eve supplement and Xmas Eve supplement is mandatory for all staying guest staying during the said period.

2 night stay are mandatory during RIFF/Christmas/New year, JLF and Sufi festival)
Departure is not allowed on 24th December and 31st December
Cancellation Policy;- 
 (For FIT ) Cancellation or amendment within 30 days of the date of the arrival, would levy retention for 50% of the total room charges. (Festival/Black Out and Christmas/New Year period) Cancellation or amendment for the confirmed booking within 90 days of the date of arrival, would levy retention for 50% of the total room charge.
(For Groups) Cancellation of the entire group before 90 days prior to arrival, no cancellation charge will be levied.
Hotel doesn't have any TWIN BED  set up with two separate duvets on the king sixe bed.

Christmas Eve Gala Dinner Supplement : INR 4000 net and New Year Eves Gala Dinner Supplement Rs 5000 net
Dev Diwali Night Supplement Rs 6000 AI over and on the offered rates (5th November is Dev Diwali) and will be applicable for all the booked nights with NO FOC for GIT bookings.

On every 15 paying pax one pax will be given on a complimentary basis & NOT ONE ROOM. ( either  dbl will be charged or triple room will be charged as a double room ). One Single Room will not be given as a complimentary room unless the hotel reservations confirms your office on the voucher received by us.
On 10 paying pax  of dbl or  of single occupancy will be given on a complimentary basis
One child below 12 years and without extra bed will be on complimentary basis & above 12 years without extra bed, only breakfast will be charged.
Retention Policy: 
10% retention will be charged if the booking is cancelled between 15-30 days before the arrival

Contract Remarks:
Mandatory Christmas Eve supplement Dinner and New Year Eve Supplement Dinner.

07-12 = To be charged 50% off with existing bed on cp, if 2 children then both are to charged half value of buffet b/fast.

Cancellations : GIT- 45 days prior to the arrival and for FIT 48 hrs prior to arrival.

Hotel: Waghoba Eco Lodge - Tadoba National Park
Contract Remarks:
Cancellation policy:- 45 days and above 20% cancellation charges.
Amendment in dates within 35 days from arrival is treated as cancellation. 
Long weekend bookings like Diwali, Holi, Christmas and new year are non- refundable.
Check-out is not allowed on 31 dec.
Mandatory 3-nights stay over New Year Eve. Mandatory New Year Supplement is Rs. 3000 per person.
For more activities please refer to contract.
